events.message: The customer reported a collision involving their vehicle and another car at an intersection causing significant front-end damage.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident based on keywords such as vehicle, collision, and accident mentioned in the report.
An agent was assigned to handle the auto accident claim and follow up with the customer for further details and documentation.
Acknowledgment email sent to the customer confirming receipt of their vehicle accident claim and outlining the next steps.
Requested police report, photos of vehicle damage, and repair estimates to proceed with the investigation of the auto accident claim.
Customer submitted all requested documents including police report and multiple photos of the car's front and side damage.
Investigation into the vehicle collision commenced to verify damages and determine liability for the accident.
Investigation completed confirming the accident occurred due to another driver's fault; vehicle damage assessment finalized.
Proposed settlement offer sent to the customer covering repair costs based on investigation results and damage estimates.
Customer responded positively to the proposed settlement and expressed appreciation for the timely and professional handling.
The claim was officially approved by our claims department authorizing payment to the customer for vehicle repairs.
Payment for the approved settlement was issued to the customer, covering all verified damages resulting from the accident.
The auto accident claim was closed after payment issuance and confirmation that the customer was satisfied with the resolution.
The case file has been archived in the system for future reference and record-keeping following the closure of the claim.
